content:
The next attack of the Russians at the position of Tavriya separate landing brigade has become the last for many of them.

Appropriate videoHe made public on March 29The General Staff of the Armed Forces.

The artillery of the defense forces first destroyed the equipment and then undertake to destroy the infantry. Everything burned: and armored vehicles and fillet parts of the invaders.

Like P.The ArmyInform reported earlier, in the east, our soldiers destroyed 640 invaders, 8 tanks and almost 400 UAVs of the invaders.
title: In the area of Novomikhailivka the occupiers staged a massacre with fireworks
description: The corresponding video was published on March 29, the General Staff of the Armed Forces. Artillery of Defense Forces First ...
author: Army Inform
